provision # community and one user

# init-id

gov4git --config $WORK/config.json init-gov
stdout private_key_ed25519

# init-gov

gov4git --config $WORK/config.json init-id
stdout private_key_ed25519

# add/verify user

gov4git --config $WORK/config.json user add --name member1 --repo ~/member_public --branch main
gov4git --config $WORK/config.json group list --name everybody
stdout member1

# balance

gov4git --config $WORK/config.json balance add --key credits --user member1 --value 30.0
gov4git --config $WORK/config.json balance get --key credits --user member1
stdout 30

gov4git --config $WORK/config.json balance set --key credits --user member1 --value 20.0
gov4git --config $WORK/config.json balance get --key credits --user member1
stdout 20

gov4git --config $WORK/config.json balance mul --key credits --user member1 --value 5.0
gov4git --config $WORK/config.json balance get --key credits --user member1
stdout 100
